documents.document:
Tired weeks~~!!T_T

arg~!!! SPM coming soon le....
So nervous sia....
haiz....
Next week...Spm le..So scared!!
But still ok...Coz next week all exam i can score 1..
After that week, really die...
All hard hard de subject...
But..if i think that after exam...have many things waiting me to do... i will become more stronger and more confident...
The important is more pray..hahaha..
Now all my days only !!
Arg~~ SIANXxxx!!!
Luckily can write blog here...den won't be so boring le..

SUFFERING~

SICK SICK SICK~~!! ..Sick cause me so suffer this few day...Everyday ...every minutes...coughing.. Want sleep weel also cannot..T_T HELP AR...wan study also no mood study ade...GOD AR>>PLEASE HEAL ME.... DRYING~ The most suffer is sore throat like hell... want eat ar..drink ar..talk ar..also hard...coz very very pain..
Eat medicine liao...feel sleepy..cannot study ade..SobbbbXzz..

Sian ArZzz~

Walao neh...today go school...9 periods math modern... SIAO~!! my teacher crazy..=.= give us 2 set maths..dunno from which state 1..So difficult..do untill going mad~ my friend pro maths 1..also say very difficult sia..haizzzz...today rain again coz me feel like want sleep..dunno why raining still feel damn hot...dunno wat weather lai.. sick haven't well..haiz..yesterday coughing whole night..T_T cannot sleep..pity loh..Sobxxx

Sing of your love by Planet Shakers

Sing Of Your Love
by Planet Shakers
album: Always And Forever (2005)

I love who I've become in You
You've changed me from deep within
Without You I can't live
I need the touch of Your strong hand

I only live and breathe in You
Because of You I've been made whole
Without You I can't live
I need the touch of Your strong hand

And I will sing of Your love
And Your mercy forever
Reaching down from above
With a plan for my future
I'll forever proclaim
All the goodness and power of Your name
I will worship You Lord all my days

I will worship You forever
I will worship You forever

You can go this website listen this nice christian song and there still got more Planet Shakers' song:
http://www.yzhan.com/wammforchrist/radio.blog/?autoplay=

My lao jie back le~~~=.="

Today ar??? Nothing special lah…just my tiger lao jie back from UPM and she bring her lovely boyfriend back…haizz....I lost my freedom liao…Sure kena kpkb by her..T_T But nevermind lah..she back also good for me..this is because she can teach me add maths ma..hehehe~~no need ask my friend teach..^^ But ho…if ask her teach ..she sure scold me stupid 1…she will say : so easy de question you also dunno…really stupid lah..haiz...Tonight my daddy bring us go eat seafood ler..hehe..Btw i not really like eat seafoods..my sister damn like..haizz..me become more fat ade ler...more 2kg ler...Sobxxx...>.< And tonight I use my sister's boyfriend's(chee hoo) laptop write blog ler..hehe…his laptop ar…so laoya 1..always lagg..coz my want retype my blog so many times.. Aiyer~~ Wednesday my SPM exam start ade...DIE..DIE..DIE...I haven't prepared ler..And dunno want prepared what too..Haizzz..my friend damn bad...say want give me history tips..but always say forgot..hmmfp bluff me 1..bad bad!!! But forget about it lah..i think got tips i also will failed 1...everytimes exam i also failed 1..haha.. I give up my history ade...Lastly GOOD LUCK myself and all friends are taking SPM this year…Wish you all get GOOD result lah…I only hope that I can get 6 A’s lah..hehe not many lah…just a bit greedy.. hehe...

My sister's boyfriend back KL ade..=D

haizzz....today..10.30am den wake up..hahaha... because sunday ma...so wake late bit loh...Today follow my sister and her boyfriend go morning market..And my sister cook mee for us..hmm..not bad lah..After that, watching tv whole day..den my sister go secret receipe buy cakes..She brought a piece of white chocolate cake for me..hehe..my favorites.. eat cake and watch tv..so enjoy ler~~~ den play yahoo games loh.. Tonight my sister's boyfriend want back KL ade..11.15pm back ade...my parents still bring him go eat ler...aiyoyo..he ar..become more fatter than before ade...haha..he say my sister cause him become so fat 1..haha..he quite funny lah..haha~haiz..my poor sister..dunno get what sickness~her hand pain many months ade..and she become more thinner than before ade...so pity..haiz..GOD please heal my sister..save her from sickness..Amen.. hehe..=D ok lah..time to sleep ade..^^ have a nice day to my friends ba..

=.= nothing to write~Boring~~

wah~~~today 12.30pm den wake up sia..hahaha~~ maybe yesterday too late sleep ade..And today lazy din't go school.. I think teacher also din't teach anything ade..And my friends also dun wan go school..i think my class..no people go too..hehe~haiz..today so boring..no moob study ..haiz..wah..my sister also want play maple sia..ask me help her download and lent her account to play..So i also got chance play play loh..keke~~One month++ never play maple ade..haizzzz~quite miss my friends..>.< but today go in..no people online too..sad~ Nevermind lah..haizzz... Hope my exam can fast fast pass...den i can do anything i want...hehehe~~

aiyer~~tomorrow exam le~~T_T

>.<really die ade....DIE ~~DIE~~DIE~~Tomorrow exam le....what can i do??? Study loh...haizz..today just start take up my book and read..haizzz...dunno what i am read also...haizzz....sian...exam siannn...tomorrow chinese subject...hope can score this subject..hehe~~ Good luck ba..

Today Chinsese Subject ler~~

hehe~~finally my chinese subject finish ade..luckily not very difficult..haiz...not enough time to complete my essay...sad~ got some question dunno do sia..dunno what mean...sobbbxxxx..yippie~~tomorrow no exam..can prepared my malay and history ade..hehehe~~~

........

haha~dunno want put what titile.. today no exam ler...hehe~yesterday night go hot water pool at Ulu Legong,Baling..haha~water at there all warm warm de...but quite hot too..haha..not bad lah...my dad ask me swim there sia..=.= but cannot lah..there so hot..my face cannot go in!!! cause too hot..hehe..my dad cool...still can swim..=.= haha...after go hot water pool...still go eat sia..fat liao ler~~ haiz....back home already 2.30am~~hahaha~too tired..so today sleep till 11.00am den wake up...hehe...den watching tv whole day.. den see my sister din't use her laptop and take this chance to write blog loh..hahahha~~!!! MOnday malay and history paper one ler~~i hate history...HISTORY FLIP~! now just hope my malay can score A hehe~~!! Good luck to all my new friends..hehe...have a lucky exam month ba~~hahahah!!!

Tired day~~!!>.

Today dunno why so tired 1~~ MAybe yesterday 3am sleep ba...Because play game..hahahaha~~~Exam still play game sia.. My waist so pain sia~ I think old liao lah...>.< Today facebox cannot go in wo~~That's why today i so late then write my blog..wah!! my cousin today give me SPM tips ler~~hehehe But don't have Sejarah 1~ I want ma~~aiyo!!!Nevermind lah...got i also lazy study 1 lah..hahaha Today my sister bake cheese cake ler~SoooOOo Nice~ Yummy~~ Wah!! 1am ade...time to sleep ade !!!! haiz ..today no study again..lazy loh!!! Tomorrow must study liao....hehe that's all ba~~!!! =end=

~.~ SianZzzzz

=.=" what I’m doing today???? I also dunno ler~haiZZZ.. play game whole day??? Haha..hehe..today go shopping ler~~with my lao jie loh… hahaha~ and go there eat Mc Donald(Spicy chicken McDeluxe) hehehe~~~ And I meet someone…I know him at taekwando class de….if I not wrong his name is chu er~ haha!!! Long time never see him ade…he never change still look like same..sianZzz..Monday want exam liao…feel panic and tired…when open my book want do revision …feel sleepy sia..>.< Got revision also look like don’t have ~ what can I do??>.< haizzzz~~ I go study le~~~If not Monday paper dunno do…den really die liao..hahaha~~~ =end=

T_T very not happy today~~:(

I'm so sad~~!!!Not because today my history test i dunno at all~~ Someone make me disapointed~~!!I suddenly feel very very sad and hate her....I very angry what she tell me today...And i feel that i really stupid...treat her so good... Hoe could her do like that to me...Sobxxx.... haizzz... today...english paper not really hard..just paper 2 abit difficult..my history ler.. i dunno at all..T_T what i have read dun have out.. Sobxxx... Den yesterday..why no write blog ler??? Because want read history ma... BUT only out 1 question i have read.. WTH!!! Now my heart pain...liao! T_T waiting for my favourite subject hehe~~ Math~~ The only subject i got confident can get A...~~~ Thursday no exam loh...den I can do revision le!! hehe...^^ Time to rest ..Zzzzz wan sleep le~~ hehe!!! =end=

Ouch~~My head dam pain~~

>.< yesterday too late sleep ade..coz my sister download maple just complete so go check check new map loh~~haizz check until 2.30am sia..hahaha~ Because meet my da ge ma..long time no chat ade..so chat chat loh~~hehe!..Today no exam.. So can rest le.. Cannot sleep well many days ade.. haizz.. coz exam loh..hope my exam can fast fast finish~~ den i'm free liao..hehe..^^ Yesterday still go out eat supper with my family sia..wah~~~Noooo..fat liao.. So scary..this months up 2 kg ler..>.< cannot eat too much ade.. haizz..head very pain..dun wan write too much too..And tomorrow still got exam..EST ..haiz.. that subject cannot read 1..=.= But that subject damn..difficult..coz all words very chim 1...=.= nvm... Keep hardworking~~ Gambateh neh~~^^ =end=

Zzz...long time no write blog..

hahahha~~ many days din't write blog...why ler??? NOt because i study hard until no time write blog..is because i lazy loh...and forgot..hahaha~~~ And what my news??? Erm.... i just brought 2 set movie..hehe...so everyday hardworking watch loh...and i help my friend bought 1 set too..nice movie..i like it..hehe~~ just finish watched...Besides, my computer format ade...so~ hehe..can play games again.. i download ade my favourite games(maple and audition loh) ^^ Sigh~~=.="" Yippie~~ more 3 subject ..my exam finish ade... sooo~~ i can chiong games again..so happy~^^ so miss all my maple friends.. NOw i know how to format computer ade.. My sister's boyfriend teach me 1..^^ he come my house see my sister..because my sister sick ma..^^hehe~~haizz..also nothing want write ~~so end here ba~^^ =end=

happy hour soon~~!!

wah~~SooooOOo..happy..finally my spm left 1 subject~~biology~~~hahahha..after biology..i'm freeee~~~Yippie!!! Then i want go take car license..haizz..scare cannot pass sia..coz everytime exam also failed 1..>.< Hehehe~~today want go pc fair..but ho..finally change to shopping sia...go perangin mall..wah..i saw many nice clothes loh..i want buy~~but..but..no money buy ler...and my mum sure wash me..if i buy..=.=" sad~~~ Today ler..go shopping with my sister and my friend(shyan)..^^ and go there meet my sister friend(wan pei) loh.. Her sister get married..so want buy shoes to her sister wedding..haha~~ I'm waiting my tiger sister marry..hahaha..more 5 years??? hope ba..hehe When back meet Danny..and his 2 friends..all graphic designer sia.. i hope i can be designer too..but my sister say me..dun waste money lah..you cannot 1..sad.. my friend(shyan), she so lucky..meet someone willing to sponser her to learn design..maybe she really got talent ba..and me dun have talent..see her picture...design so nice..haizz...i also dunno what i want study after spm...continue form six?? But want choose what course??? This i also dunno..i just got interesting about computer's things..I also hope i can meet a person like shyan's sponser(Peter)..Just can put all my destiny to god~~ Hope god can lead me to a good road..haizzz...that's all lah..>.< =end=

Finally~~SPM over~~Yippie~!!

I wait today very long ade...my spm finally over ade...so happy..Yesterday still go celebrated..haha..My friends and me go eat KFC..keke~~hehehe~~ so happy..November and December..is my sweet sweet memory..with my ex-bf...haizzzz...suddenly thinking him..Long time din't see him online ade..dunno he fine or not..but i think he will always fine..I saw his latest picture..feel so dissapointed...he dye his hair...break his good image in my in mind ade..haizz..watever lah..I hope this year i will have a nice and happy christmas day...don't want like last year..bad memory..sad..haizz..haha..now want keep money to ready buy new clothes for christmas..and present..^^hehe... and i still want 2 A-cash..hehe..to chiong lvl..keke~ermm...that's right??!! Lazy write blog this few week.. Wish all Form 5 ppl happy holiday and engjoy ur holiday..^^ =end=

NOw holiday~~

hehe~~ holiday le...Everyday also very late den sleep~~Because watching movie ma..hehe...Inuyasha..my favourite anime~~hehe~~ Morning ler...play maple loh.. I stop play A world ade...NOw play D world...hehe~~Today just level 30..>.<
So slow right??? my friend already 4x and 5x! >.< Because they all use x2 exp 1>.< i no money cannot buy..sobx~~ This few days...lazy write blogs ..=.= and nothing want write~~ =end=

lazy lazy~~!!=x

wah~~~ i how long din't write blog ade ar?? i also dunno loh~~~ hehe!! coz i lazy ma...hehe~~Christmas soon~~~ Erm~~ i got go where play??? no loh~~!! go chruch loh~~exchange present loh...sianzZz~ haizz.. i also got keep money to buy christmas new clothes ler...But.. dunno why.. i go shopping centre ar..pasar pagi ar~~ also cannot find suitable me de clothes..sian~~Maybe i wear my old clothes loh.. Today my sister's bf come my house again..coz he wan celebrate christmas day with my sister ma..wah so sweet~~>.< haizz.pity i dun have boyfriend loh~~ haiz This year christmas i think i will alone again loh~~ Alone celebrate loh~~~ every year also sameone..nothing special~~Sometimes i also think dun wan go chruch lah..so sianZzz.. i also dun have anything want talk with them de... prefer alone ba~~ ISOLATED~!! =end=

~.~

hAHA~~ About 1 months++ never open facebox ade~~~ hahaha~~ This is because i forgot and lazy ~~ =X hahaha~~ this few weeks i always play games =X and never on facebox~ But after this i will always check check my facebox le~~ haha~!!!Christmas and new years also same~~=.= BORED!!!! But i think this year Chinese New Year will be more fun~~ ^^Because i going visit my uncle from KL de~~hehehe!!!! And 26th Jan i want go take car licese test le~~ hehe!!! All wishes me can pass ba~~ hehe!!CNY i also will go my friends house take ang pao~kekeS.. and my maple bf say ho~ want come find me worhS~~ Dunno want go meet him or not!!! =.=" HaiZzz~~ See first larh~~ =D Hope this year my CNY will be more FUN~~ -end-

>.< Tomorrow take test~~!!!

Finally can take car test le~~ kekeke~~!! hope i can pass... den i can go any place i like le...kekekeke!!!!!! Chinese new year can drive car go my friend's house take ang pao le... And can buy many new clothes~~ happy loh!!! =D shyan shyan birthday le..dunno want buy what present for her..haizz~~ that day she birthday..i dun have buy any present for her..=.=" but she buy a big lolipop for me..=.=" haizzz~~ paiseh lah!! Sobb~~ my da ge..chinese new year no back liao... going 3 years no see him ade..miss him alot ~~ hope he can fast fast come back..kekeS~~ and bring me go kai kai~~heheS...hahahaha~~ today at friendster see tio 1 guy..dunno who lai acting school teacher~~ hahahha..funny lah..dunno how to say~~ he post testi to a teacher..funny sia~~~anyone interest can go see... url:http://www.friendster.com/chickcock
hahahah~~~ funny lah~~=D =end=

My Valentine's Day~~

heheS~~ this year special abit lah~~ Coz this year got people celebrate with me ma!!^^ 12am~~ me playing maple loh~~ and having a wedding in maple kekeS~~Den Afternoon about 6.15pm, William come fetch me.. shyan already sit inside le~den go fetch ah Leong and Bernard loh~~ den we start our journey to Penang- The Realm Church. ^^ On the way, traffic jam sia..>.< about take 2 hours ++ reach there loh.. After reach church, i saw quite many people loh~( Zurene,Yoggie, Joanne, Mark, Hannah and more) ^^ And i phone a person ( Yuan- my new boyfriend =X), he say going reach soon~ ask me go down wait him loh~~ heheS..Then few mins pass, i saw a guy wear red T-shirt de walk to me~~heheS..guess is who? sure yuan loh..(crap~=X) Den we go up..and i intro to my friend loh.. all friends shock~~ kekeS~~hahaha!!! And we start eat ~~ shyan make de cake nice...and more food ko~~ After eat..we got play games(true or dare)..OMGF~~ i kena DARE wo~~ =.=" lucky they just ask me hug Yuan~~hahahaS..easy lah..like hug baby only ma..=X heheS~ Really fun lah..that game...After that, we eat 2nd round..Lolx..hahahaS~~ And all couples dancing with their boyfriend/girlfriend loh~` heheS~~ So romantic =X After dance, we talk talk, and take some pictures loh..and About 10.45pm Yuan say he wan back home ade...Den ma bye bye loh~=D After that, me and my friends continue huat siao in the church..lolX( in the chruch =.=" hahaha~~ And we all back home happily~~kekeS.. that's all my valentine's day~~ -end-
